featured.text: An eye stye is a small bump, resembling a pimple, that develops when an oil gland at the edge of an eyelid becomes infected by bacteria.
Make sure you don’t squeeze or pop a stye like you would a pimple.

definition.zh_def: 皮膚上小而突起的腫塊，通常是由於毛孔堵塞或感染引起的。
definition.en_def: A small, raised bump on the skin, often caused by clogged pores or infection.
definition.example: She applied a cream to reduce the redness of the pimple on her forehead.
